<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cabin+Sketch:wght@400;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
  /* Page-specific background for index only */
  body {
    background-image: url('images/home/mosaic.png');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-attachment: fixed;
    min-height: 100vh;
  }

  .animated-text {
    font-size: 80px;
    color: #000;
    font-family: 'Cabin Sketch';
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: middle;
  }

  @keyframes letterAnimation {
    0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-10px); }
    10% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
    100% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(10px); }
  }

  /* Simple Carousel Styles */
  .tech-carousel {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 25px 40px;
    border-radius: 25px;
    color: white;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 40px;
    margin: 15px;
    box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
    min-width: 400px;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.5s ease;
  }

  .tech-carousel .icon {
    font-size: 60px;
    margin-right: 15px;
  }
</style>

::: {.column-screen}

<div class="animated-text">
  <p>WebGIS Full Stack Developments</p>
  <div id="tech-carousel" class="tech-carousel">
    <span class="icon">🗺️</span><span class="text">QGIS</span>
  </div>
  <p>Exploring the unknown</p>
</div>

<script>
const technologies = [
  { icon: '🗺️', text: 'QGIS', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #4c6ef5, #5b7cfa)' },
  { icon: '🛰️', text: 'ARCGIS PRO', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #5b7cfa, #6a8aff)' },
  { icon: '🔍', text: 'GEOSPATIAL ANALYSIS', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #6a8aff, #7c3aed)' },
  { icon: '📡', text: 'REMOTE SENSING', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #7c3aed, #8b5cf6)' },
  { icon: '🌐', text: 'WEB GIS', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #8b5cf6, #a855f7)' },
  { icon: '⚛️', text: 'REACT', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #a855f7, #c084fc)' },
  { icon: '☕', text: 'SPRING BOOT', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #c084fc, #d8b4fe)' },
  { icon: '🐚', text: 'BASH & LINUX', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #d8b4fe, #e879f9)' },
  { icon: '🛠️', text: 'DEVOPS', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #e879f9, #f0abfc)' },
  { icon: '☁️', text: 'AWS', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f0abfc, #f472b6)' },
  { icon: '📄', text: 'MARKDOWN', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #f472b6, #fb7185)' },
  { icon: '☕', text: 'JAVA', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #fb7185, #fda4af)' },
  { icon: '🐍', text: 'PYTHON', bg: 'linear-gradient(135deg, #fda4af, #fecaca)' }
];

let currentIndex = 0;
const carousel = document.getElementById('tech-carousel');

function updateCarousel() {
  const tech = technologies[currentIndex];
  carousel.style.background = tech.bg;
  carousel.innerHTML = `<span class="icon">${tech.icon}</span><span class="text">${tech.text}</span>`;
  
  currentIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % technologies.length;
}

// Initialize and start carousel
updateCarousel();
setInterval(updateCarousel, 2000); // Change every 2 seconds
</script>

:::
